about_the_game:
What a steal! This old virtual pet game from the 90s was almost free at a yard sale two blocks away, and it was just the thing you were looking for! Now it's time to meet Babette, the cute cat that lives inside this bright little casing. Babette is dying to play with you! If you keep her happy, you might gain a friend for life!

More than just a Virtual Cat

The more you take care of Babette, the more things seem off. Feeding her, playing with her, petting her... it becomes more and more difficult. She seems to be developing a mind of her own. You hear footsteps outside your house. Doors opening downstairs. Eyes in the dark, staring at you. Who is inside your house? And is this cute kitten trying to break free?

Keep Babette Happy!

Throughout the game, you will cuddle up in your bedroom and play through five levels, each more difficult than the last. Keep Babette happy by using the unique button combination of the pet egg to perform mini-games: Pet her! Feed her! Play with her! Blood sacrifice! Play hide and seek! Do badly, and Babette will get mad. Balance keeping Babette happy with filling the progress bar to finish the level and make her go 'night night!'

Survive Nightmare Mode

After the events of the main game, you get vivid nightmares. It's like she's there, inside your head. The level begins, but this time it's different. So much more difficult. If you lose to Babette this time, you might lose it all...

Can you keep Babette happy?

Can you keep Babette contained?

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of blood, implications of self-harm

name: Babette

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: There's this old 90s virtual pet game at a yard sale. It's called 'Babette'. Now you can play with Babette the cat from the comfort of your bedroom. Just you and her! Keep Babette happy by playing with her, feeding her, and more! Except... Babette's more than just a cat. And she's coming for you.
